properties.tree_description:
Numbered flaggint tape Reason for Removal:OtherComments:Undesired species.
		
		
			Tree number:2Species:Hackberry Tree Size (DBH):6Tree location:See site map Description of Tree:Numbered flaggint tape Reason for Removal:OtherComments:Basal area has a small wound with a dog-leg bending moment suggesting a re-sprout. Invasive species cover most of the canopy. Overall canopy has a lean >20°.
		
		
			Tree number:3Species:Winged Elm Tree Size (DBH):8Tree location:See site map Description of Tree:Numbered flaggint tape Reason for Removal:OtherComments:Suppressed canopy with lean over property and bending moment at the top. Former double trunk indicated by decayed stump remnant.
		
		
			Tree number:4Species:Winged Elm Tree Size (DBH):8Tree location:See site map Description of Tree:Numbered flaggint tape Reason for Removal:OtherComments:Growing within SRP of neighboring elm. One leader is dead and decayed; remaining leader has a suppressed lean.
		
		
			Tree number:5Species:Sweetgum Tree Size (DBH):38Tree location:See site map Description of Tree:Numbered flaggint tape Reason for Removal:OtherComments:Asymmetrical canopy with multiple historic failure points, including a large dead scaffold. The tree is in a state of senescence.
		
		
			Tree number:6Species:Pecan Tree Size (DBH):11Tree location:See site map Description of Tree:Numbered flaggint tape Reason for Removal:OtherComments:Downward-tracking wound with decay underneath. Ivy covers bole. Co-dominant structure with a breakage event on the subordinate leader.
		
		
			Tree number:7Species:LigustrumTree Size (DBH):13Tree location:See site map Description of Tree:Numbered flaggint tape Reason for Removal:OtherComments:Undesired species.
		
		
			Tree number:8Species:LigustrumTree Size (DBH):13Tree location:See site map Description of Tree:Numbered flaggint tape Reason for Removal:OtherComments:Undesired species.
		
		
			Tree number:9Species:Mulberry Tree Size (DBH):22Tree location:See site map Description of Tree:See site map Reason for Removal:OtherComments:Undesired species. Broken, dead leader on one stem. 
		
		
			Tree number:10Species:Mimosa Tree Size (DBH):10Tree location:See site map Description of Tree:See site map Reason for Removal:OtherComments:Undesired species; basal cavity at a former co-dominant trunk.
		
		
			Tree number:11Species:Black Cherry Tree Size (DBH):14Tree location:See site map Description of Tree:See site map Reason for Removal:OtherComments:Lean >20°.
		
		
			Tree number:12Species:Black Chjerry Tree Size (DBH):10Tree location:See site map Description of Tree:See site map Reason for Removal:OtherComments:Decay at structural root plate from previous impact. Basal lean >20°. One broken leader.
		
		
			Tree number:13Species:Bocelder Tree Size (DBH):10Tree location:See site map Description of Tree:See site map Reason for Removal:OtherComments:Lean >20° with sloughing and deformed bark.
		
		
			Tree number:14Species:Poplar Tree Size (DBH):27Tree location:See site map Description of Tree:See site map Reason for Removal:OtherComments:Slingshot formation, likely from past topping or breakage, resulting in weak structure and a moment of poor taper below the co-dominant union.
		
		
			Tree number:15Species:Mulberry Tree Size (DBH):12Tree location:See site map Description of Tree:See site map Reason for Removal:OtherComments:Undesired species; tree appears dead.
		
		
			Tree number:16Species:Tree of Heaven Tree Size (DBH):11Tree location:See site map Description of Tree:See site map  Reason for Removal:OtherComments:Undesired species.
		
		
			Tree number:17Species:Mulberry Tree Size (DBH):7Tree location:See site map Description of Tree:Numbered flagging tape Reason for Removal:OtherComments:Undesired species. Stem has failed; the snapped crown is laying upside down next to the tree.
		
		
			Tree number:18Species:Mulberry Tree Size (DBH):26Tree location:See site map Description of Tree:Numbered flagging tape Reason for Removal:OtherComments:Undesired species. Lean >20°.
		
		
			Tree number:19Species:Mulberry Tree Size (DBH):10Tree location:See site map Description of Tree:Numbered flagging tape Reason for Removal:OtherComments:Undesired species. Basal girdling from embedded wire.
		
		
			Tree number:20Species:silver Maple Tree Size (DBH):14Tree location:See site map Description of Tree:Numbered flagging tape Reason for Removal:OtherComments:Lean >20°.
		
		
			Tree number:21Species:Water Oak Tree Size (DBH):7Tree location:See site map Description of Tree:Numbered flagging tape Reason for Removal:OtherComments:Mechanical damage from fallen oak. Fruiting bodies at base.
		
		
			Tree number:22Species:Black Cherry Tree Size (DBH):9Tree location:See site map Description of Tree:Numbered flagging tape Reason for Removal:OtherComments:Lean >20° into ROW. Broken resprouted lead. Asymmetrical canopy.
